casebody.data:
Cuyahoga County Bar Association v. Stidham.

[Cite as Cuyahoga Cty. Bar Assn. v. Stidham (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 93.]

(No. 94-1377 Submitted August 17, 1994 Decided December 7, 1994.) *94Lawrence A. Twrbow and Michael E. Murman, for relator. *95 Per Curiam.

We agree with the findings and adopt the recommendations of the board. Respondent, Ronald J. Stidham, is hereby suspended indefinitely from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
